Building the Connected Home

A simple and open solution to connect every device to the web.

Try Lelylan

An API that gets out of your way

The connected home should be easy and accessible to everyone.
See how turning on a light only requires few lines of code.

  • Curl
  • Ruby
  • Node.js
  • AngularJS
curl -X PUT http://api.lelylan.com/devices/<light-id>/properties \
     -H 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \
     -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
     -d '{ "properties": [{ "id": "<status>", "value": "on" }] }'</status></token></light-id>
var Lelylan = require('lelylan-node')({ token: token });
var params  = { properties: [{ id: '<status>', value: 'on' }] };
Lelylan.Device.properties('<light-id>', params, callback);</light-id></status>
<div ng-app="lelylan">
  <!-- login component here (dev.lelylan.com/api/oauth#implicit-grant-angular) -->
  <div ng-controller="LelylanController">{{device}}</div>
  <script>
    function LelylanController($scope, Device) {
      var params = { id: '<light-id>', properties: [{ id: '<status>', value: 'on' }] };
      $scope.device = new Device(params);
      $scope.device.$properties();
    }
  </script>
</div>
lelylan = Lelylan::Client.new(token: token)
params  = { properties: [{ id: '<status>', value: 'on' }] };
device  = lelylan.device_properties('<light-id>', params)</light-id></status>

Learn More →

A perfect match for
Makers, Designers and Kickstarters

Create new physical devices for your home and connect them to the web in no time. What formally might have taken weeks or months to have a set of web apps, can now be created in a matter of days. You focus on the hardware and the design process, we do the rest.

Learn more →

An new tool for
Web Developers

Lelylan offers a simple and open set of REST API to easily create new apps for the connected home. Whether or not your app is for web, mobile, voice, etc. Lelylan offers everything you need to get started in minutes.

Learn more →

A place where to
Improve the Connected Home

Lelylan is based on collaborations. Our goals is to create a group of people that wants to challenge the connected home hacking existing hardware, building new apps and solving challanges the connected home offers today.

Learn more →
